title: Install SigRepo
text: Navigate $HOME directory Create SigRepo_DB folder $HOME directory. folder used store SigRepo database local machine. Clone SigRepo_Server repository $HOME directory Navigate SigRepo_Server folder Run install_sigrepo.sh initialize MySQL database instance, configure API endpoints, launch Shiny Dashboard simultaneously. Important Notes: ’re installing SigRepo local machine, choose option (1) prompted. ’re installing virtual machine, select option (2) instead.  choose option (2), ’ll also need enter public domain name public IP address server.  – get public domain name virtual machine. Try simple command terminal. – get list IP addresses virtual machine. Try command. Note: determine IP address public private, check falls within following private IP ranges (RFC 1918): 10.0.0.0–10.255.255.255, 172.16.0.0–172.31.255.255, 192.168.0.0–192.168.255.255. IP address within one ranges, private IP address; otherwise, public IP address. Next, prompted location set MySQL database, enter full path SigRepo_DB directory created step (2).  ’ve finished rest installation steps without issues, see output similar following. Based output previous step (5), open web browser choice navigate http://localhost:8020 /__docs__/ verify SigRepo API successfully hosted.  Important Notes: Based results step (5), MySQL database deployed port 3306, API runs port 8020, Shiny Dashboard launched port 8050. ’s important note although database created initial setup, starts empty — schema data tables created stage. Therefore, running API next important step builds database structure fills required tables. Without step, users able access interact database, SigRepo Shiny Dashboard fail run properly. Among list API endpoints available localhost:8020/__docs__/, init_db endpoint specifically used initialize database schema essential reference tables organisms, phenotypes, platforms, sample types, etc. execute endpoint, click “Try ” button API directive. opens interactive prompt can run API directly. need provide Admin Key authentication execution. ’ve forgotten Admin Key step (5), can retrieve .Renviron file, environment variables stored. file located $HOME/SigRepo_DB directory local machine.  completing database setup step (6), open preferred web browser go http://localhost:8050 confirm SigRepo Shiny dashboard running expected. Note: Try login default username = “montilab” password = “sigrepo”   questions issues? Please report github issues.
code: cd $HOME mkdir SigRepo_DB git clone https://github.com/montilab/SigRepo_Server cd SigRepo_Server bash install_sigrepo.sh hostname -f hostname -I [+] Running 3/3  ✔ Container sigrepo-mysql  Running                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       0.0s   ✔ Container sigrepo-api    Running                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       0.0s   ✔ Container sigrepo-shiny  Started                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       0.0s   SigRepo setup is complete! SigRepo MySQL database is currently deployed at port 3306 SigRepo API is currently deployed at localhost:8020/__docs__/ SigRepo Shiny is currently deployed at localhost:8050
